title: Finance Minister’s statement on talks with IMF to be debated in parliament
body_lines: The statement made by Finance Minister Ali Sabry on the discussions held with the International Monetary Fund will be taken up for debate in the parliament on the 4th of May, says the Leader of the House.
According to Minister Dinesh Gunawardena, the decision was taken at the meeting of the political party leaders held today (April 22).
